text.content:
Sorry!

You hit and ally adjacent to you or an ally adjacent to the target.

Melee

Lost the Target

You take a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls]{-2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls} until the end of your next turn.

Ranged

Sprain

Until healed, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2}.

Unarmed

Weakened

You take @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -2 circumstance penalty to spell attack rolls and spell DC's]{-2 circumstance penalty to spell attack rolls and spell DC's} until the end of your next turn.

Spell
